title: Experience lamp

properties.name: description
properties.value: An Experience lamp can refer to any one of the multiple lamps which give experience in one or more skills. They are:

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Experience lamp (disambiguation)

An Experience lamp can refer to any one of the multiple lamps which give experience in one or more skills. They are:

Quests and Achievement diaries[edit | edit source]

  • Antique lamp, a reward after completing a part of the Karamja Diary and various Quests
  • Antique lamp (easy), a reward after completing an easy diary
  • Antique lamp (medium), a reward after completing a medium diary
  • Antique lamp (hard), a reward after completing a hard diary
  • Antique lamp (elite), a reward after completing an elite diary
  • Blessed lamp, a reward after completing The Great Brain Robbery
  • Combat lamp, a reward after completing Contact!
  • Dreamy lamp, a reward after completing Dream Mentor

Other[edit | edit source]

  • Lamp, a reward from the genie random event
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
{{external|rs=Experience lamp (disambiguation)}}
An '''Experience lamp''' can refer to any one of the multiple lamps which give experience in one or more skills. They are:

==Quests and Achievement diaries==
*[[Antique lamp]], a reward after completing a part of the [[Karamja Diary]] and various [[Quests]]
*[[Antique lamp (easy)]], a reward after completing an easy diary
*[[Antique lamp (medium)]], a reward after completing a medium diary
*[[Antique lamp (hard)]], a reward after completing a hard diary
*[[Antique lamp (elite)]], a reward after completing an elite diary
*[[Blessed lamp]], a reward after completing [[The Great Brain Robbery]]
*[[Combat lamp]], a reward after completing [[Contact!]]
*[[Dreamy lamp]], a reward after completing [[Dream Mentor]]

==Other==
*[[Lamp]], a reward from the [[genie]] [[random event]]

{{Disambig}}
